txt.en: 'Excellently done! We make a good team, eh?'
Borghild is in western Clovengap.\n\nYou should let Borghild know that you have completed the task of defeating the wasps.
The wasp hive can be found in south-western Clovengap.\n\nBorghild has asked you to deal with the wasp infestation in the nearby ruins.

'Hail, [placeholder]. We meet again, and what fortuitous timing you have.\n\n'North of here are some old ruins which have been overrun with wasps. As you know, my eyes are my weapons. I implore you - take care of as many of the insects as you can, and put their nests to the torch.'
Within the crumbling ruins of Clovengap lie pulsing nests, full of wasp larvae.
